transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. People ride inside to get to different places. What am I?

hints.text: 👪 I can carry many people.
🛑 I have a steering wheel.
🚦 I stop at traffic lights.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can be very long. I carry people and things across long distances. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a 'choo-choo' sound.
🛤️ I need special tracks to move on.
💺 People sit in carriages to travel.

transport.question: I float on the water and help people cross the sea. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I travel on the ocean.
⚓ I have a hull that keeps me afloat.
🚢 Pirates and sailors use me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places really fast. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly high above the clouds.
🛬 I need a runway to land.
✈️ I have wings and engines to help me fly.

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can put a basket on me.
⛑️ It's important to wear a helmet when you ride me.
🚲 You can ride me in the park.

transport.question: I am like a car, but I am yellow and take people where they need to go for money. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I usually have a light on top.
📍 You can hail me on the street.
💰 You pay the driver to take you somewhere.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down. I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I make a 'whirly' sound.
🚨 I am often used for rescues.
🏥 I can land on top of a hospital.

transport.question: I am a vehicle used on farms that helps to pull things or cut the grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🚜 Farmers use me.
🌱 I'm often seen in fields.
🌾 I help with planting and harvesting crops.

transport.question: I can carry a lot of people around the city, picking up and dropping them off at different stops. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I have many seats.
🗺️ I follow a specific route.
⏱️ I run on a schedule.

transport.question: I take people to space! I am very tall and use a lot of fuel to get off the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I fly higher than a plane.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🪐 I can go to the moon and beyond.

cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I shine at night. I give Earth light, but only at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I change shape every few weeks.
🐺 Werewolves like me!
🧀 Some people think I am made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am very hot and give light and warmth to Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 You can't look directly at me.
😎 Plants need me to grow.
🔥 I am a giant ball of burning gas.

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky, far, far away. I am a giant ball of gas that makes my own light. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very, very far away.
🔭 You can see many of me in the night sky.
💡 I am like a giant, shining lightbulb.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball that travels around the Sun. I am home to plants, animals, and you! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I am mostly blue and green from space.
🌱 I am the only planet we know of with life.
💧 I have lots of water.

cosmos.question: I'm red and dusty and a planet too. Some robots explore me, what am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I'm named after the Roman god of war.
🤖 Rovers drive around on me.
💨 My surface is covered in iron oxide which makes me look red.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa Major 🐻 is one example.
🌌 Ancient people used me to tell stories.
✨ Some have names like the Big Dipper or Orion.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system, known for my giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have many moons.
🌪️ The great red spot is a storm bigger than Earth.
💨 I am a gas giant.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me made of ice and rock. What planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very wide but not very thick.
💨 I am another gas giant.
🛰️ Many spacecraft have visited me.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust, all held together by gravity. Our Sun lives in one. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 There are many different shapes of me.
🥛 Our home is called the Milky Way.
✨ I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a rock that flies through space. Sometimes I burn up when I enter Earth's atmosphere, creating a shooting star. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ Some people call me a falling star.
🌠 I can be part of a meteor shower.
🔥 I get very hot due to friction in the atmosphere.
